actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand, and extend for 10 years, the American Samoa economic development credit.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow, between January 1, 2008, and December 31, 2017, a tax credit to certain domestic corporations engaged in business activities and asset sales within American Samoa.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand, and extend for 10 years, the American Samoa economic development credit.
